news_header: Vaccine efficacy varies; influenza virus mutates rapidly, affecting protection.
news_original_title: Influenssaepidemia kiihtyy – tartunnan voi saada rokotteesta huolimatta, muistuttaa asiantuntija
news_text: Experts emphasize that influenza vaccine efficacy is not 100%, with current effectiveness ranging from 50-70%. The virus mutates quickly, impacting vaccine performance. The flu season is active in Finland, with rising infections despite vaccination. Data on vaccine efficacy will be available in March.
